mapper.select: select DISTINCT a.i_user,a.user_nm,a.profile_img,a.r_dt, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, a.r_dt, now()) as show_time, c.i_store, c.r_dt as store_dt, (select count(state) from t_product_sale where state = 2) as sold_out, (select count(i_product) from t_product_sale where state = 1 and i_user= #{i_user}) as product_count, (select count(i_user) from t_follow where i_user = #{loginUser} and target_user = #{i_user}) as is_follow, (select count(i_user) from t_follow where i_user = #{i_user}) as count_following, (select count(target_user) from t_follow where target_user=#{i_user}) as count_follow, (select count(i_store) from t_store_cmt where i_store = #{i_user} ) as count_cmt from t_user a left join t_product_sale b on a.i_user = b.i_user left join t_store c on a.i_user = c.i_user where a.i_user = #{i_user};

select a.i_user,a.i_product,a.p_nm,a.p_price,a.i_product_type,a.i_loc, a.type_sub_title,a.p_img_main,a.title,b.user_nm,b.profile_img from t_product_sale a left join t_user b on a.i_user = b.i_user left join t_store c on a.i_user = c.i_user where a.i_user = #{i_user} order by i_product desc;
select a.target_user, b.p_img_main,b.i_product from t_follow a left join t_product_sale b on a.target_user = b.i_user where a.i_user = #{i_user} order by i_product desc limit 0,3;
select a.target_user, b.p_img_main,b.i_product from t_follow a left join t_product_sale b on a.target_user = b.i_user where a.i_user = #{i_user} order by i_product desc limit 0,3;

select a.i_cmt,a.i_user,a.i_store,a.ctnt,b.user_nm, b.profile_img,TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, a.r_dt,now()) as show_time from t_store_cmt a left join t_user b on a.i_user = b.i_user where i_store =#{i_store}

select distinct a.i_user,b.i_user,a.target_user,b.user_nm,b.profile_img, (select count(i_user) from t_product_sale where i_user = b.i_user) as saleCount, (select count(i_user) from t_follow where target_user = b.i_user) as countFollow from t_follow a left join t_user b on a.i_user = b.i_user where a.target_user =#{i_user};

select distinct a.i_user,b.i_user,a.target_user,b.profile_img,b.user_nm, (select count(i_user) from t_product_sale where i_user = a.target_user) as saleCount, (select count(i_user) from t_follow where target_user = a.target_user) as countFollow from t_follow a left join t_user b on a.target_user = b.i_user where a.i_user =#{i_user};
